world_lore: The old manor has stood empty for decades. The locals say it watches those who pass by.
Some nights, when the fog rolls in thick, travelers report seeing figures that vanish when approached.
The graveyard keeper swears the tombstones are never in quite the same positions as he left them.
They say the woods remember every soul lost within them, and some still wander, searching for the way out.
In the basement of the abandoned hospital, there are operating rooms that smell faintly of ether... even now.
